title: Zero-Shot Scene Understanding for Automatic Target Recognition Using Large Vision-Language Models
details: Y Ranasinghe, V VS, J Uplinger, C De Melo, VM Patel - arXiv preprint arXiv …, 2025
abstract: Automatic target recognition (ATR) plays a critical role in tasks such as navigation and surveillance, where safety and accuracy are paramount. In extreme use cases, such as military applications, these factors are often challenged due to the presence …
